医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
三联疗法对 BR​​AF V600E 突变型转移性结直肠癌显示出强烈反应根据德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森分校研究人员领导的 III 期 BREAKWATER 试验结果，携带 BRAF V600E 突变的转移性结直肠癌 (mCRC) 患者受益于靶向疗法 encorafenib 和西妥昔单抗加 mFOLFOX6 化疗方案的一线治疗癌症中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/Triple-therapy-shows-strong-response-in-BRAF-V600E-mutant-metastatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/Triple-therapy-shows-strong-response-in-BRAF-V600E-mutant-metastatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32d98238-e0db-4b2c-a173-35b3b4035058 Sun, 26 Jan 2025 21:55:48 -0500 Triple therapy shows strong response in BRAF V600E mutant metastatic colorectal cancer
ctDNA 血液检测可识别术后可从塞来昔布获益的患者丹娜—法伯布里格姆癌症中心的研究人员对 3 期结肠癌患者进行的一项随机临床试验的数据分析发现，在癌症切除手术后，血液中有残留癌症证据的患者可能会受益于添加塞来昔布，手术治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/Blood-test-for-ctDNA-identizes-患者-who-benefit-from-celecoxib-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/Blood-test-for-ctDNA-identizes-患者-who-benefit-from-celecoxib-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b8572cc-4990-4da2-ab31-d65799608ceb Sun, 26 Jan 2025 21:34:44 -0500 Blood test for ctDNA identifies patients who benefit from celecoxib after surgery
新染料为深层组织成像和癌症治疗带来突破东京都立大学的研究人员开发出一种新型染料，可以强烈吸收二次近红外辐射并将其转化为热量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/New-dye-offers-breakthrough-in-deep-tissue-imaging-and-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/New-dye-offers-breakthrough-in-deep-tissue-imaging-and-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d990d72c-bf91-4666-9f4d-f71c1ce1541b Sat, 25 Jan 2025 09:28:00 -0500 New dye offers breakthrough in deep tissue imaging and cancer therapy
果蝇遗传学如何改变对抗蚊子疾病的斗争果蝇的交配方式可能是限制蚊子传播疾病的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/How-fruit-fly-genics-could-change-the-fight-against-mosquito-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/How-fruit-fly-genics-could-change-the-fight-against-mosquito-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e1474d8-f9fb-4d47-adc5-11804955dc5d Sat, 25 Jan 2025 07:15:18 -0500 How fruit fly genetics could change the fight against mosquito diseases
研究揭示蚕豆蛋白对口腔感觉细胞的影响慕尼黑工业大学莱布尼茨食品系统生物学研究所的研究人员首次研究了源自蚕豆的蛋白质结构如何影响人类口腔触觉细胞的细胞模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Study-reveals-impact-of-fava-bean- Proteins-on-sensory-cells-in-the-mouth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Study-reveals-impact-of-fava-bean- Proteins-on-sensory-cells-in-the-mouth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74a53b0f-b0e5-45fa-a840-20b2cf2b9c5b Sat, 25 Jan 2025 05:11:29 -0500 Study reveals impact of fava bean proteins on sensory cells in the mouth
加沙的预期寿命因持续冲突而减半根据《柳叶刀》发表的最新估计，自 2023 年 10 月战争爆发以来，加沙地带的预期寿命几乎减少了一半（-46.3%）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Gazas-life-expectancy-halved-amid-ongoing-conflict.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Gazas-life-expectancy-halved-amid-ongoing-conflict.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9eb60e3-f1db-4e11-a438-263d785fba6c Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:51:11 -0500 Gaza's life expectancy halved amid ongoing conflict
外科医生的偏好可能解释了 CABG 存活率的差异在接受冠状动脉旁路移植术（CABG）的患者中，一项评估外科医生对多动脉移植与单动脉移植偏好的新分析可能有助于解释先前回顾性分析和随机对照试验在长期生存方面的不同结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Surgeon-preferences-may-explain-differences-in-CABG-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Surgeon-preferences-may-explain-differences-in-CABG-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79633c61-904a-4cf6-96df-dd3052e5d244 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:43:28 -0500 Surgeon preferences may explain differences in CABG survival rates
研究表明声音如何影响前庭功能减退患者的平衡前庭系统是内耳中的器官网络，用于检测头部的运动和位置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Study-shows-how-the-sound-affects-balance-in-people-with-vestibular-hypofunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Study-shows-how-the-sound-affects-balance-in-people-with-vestibular-hypofunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e59491fa-f8d2-4857-9eb4-393a86fea7c0 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:25:43 -0500 Study shows how the sound affects balance in people with vestibular hypofunction
死亡细胞引发败血症的致命级联反应就像毒笔一样，垂死的细胞会用致命的信息刺痛它们的邻居。 Vijay Rathinam 和康涅狄格大学医学院的同事在 1 月 23 日的《细胞》杂志上报告说，这可能会加剧败血症。他们的发现可能会导致人们对这种危险疾病有新的认识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Dying-cells-trigger-a-lethal-cascade-in-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Dying-cells-trigger-a-lethal-cascade-in-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=636f92b1-d209-4f7a-bf10-4879bb5ea060 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:11:56 -0500 Dying cells trigger a lethal cascade in sepsis
发布成纤维细胞激活蛋白 PET 新程序标准/实践指南核医学和分子影像学会 (SNMMI) 和欧洲核医学协会 (EANM) 发布了关于使用成纤维细胞活化蛋白 (FAP) PET 的新程序标准/实践指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/New-procedure-standardpractice-guideline-released-for-fascinated-activation- Protein-PET.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/New-procedure-standardpractice-guideline-released-for-fascinated-activation- Protein-PET.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca8cd2b5-617a-4605-af8f-42e4f362d5e1 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:07:10 -0500 New procedure standard/practice guideline released for fibroblast activation protein PET
